name: PurePleat Pro
description:
Polyethersulfone Membrane Cartridges. PurePleat PRO used for critical process filtration in electronics, DI water, chemical manufacturing, wine, beer & other beverage filtration.

Features and Specifications

  • PurePleat PRO is offered in .22 and .45 micron @ 99% filtration efficiency
  • USA Manufacturing assures a superior and consistent product
  • Cartridges have excellent dirt holding capacity with low flow resistance
  • Naturally hydrophilic media does not need wetted before use
  • Multiple end cap configurations available
  • Polyethersulfone media is excellent for its low protein binding and chemical compatibility
  • Cartridges are manufactured to meet FDA Title 21 for food contact applications
  • Cartridges are constructed in a clean room environment
  • Multiple O-ring & Gasket materials available
  • Compatible Filter Housings: ICS, ICC, SCC, SCB
